weapons.name: The Colbat

positive: On kill: 33% refill for all meters

changes: Reduced the on-kill refill from 50% to 33%
weapons.reasoning: Reducing the on-kill refill from 50% to 33% would make it so that it won't refill almost instantly within 2 kills. The Flanker would need to work his way up even more with 3 kills to refill it fully. Of course, this needs some playtesting to see if it's a reasonable nerf or not.
weapons.description: This weapon reloads its entire clip at once.

weapons.name: The Soda Popper
changes: Added a 25% faster reload speed
Removed the no double jump penalty
Removed 50% faster reload speed when hype is active
weapons.reasoning: In my opinion, TF2's Soda Popper isn't that overpowered, so the reason why TC2 removed it's reload speed bonus and gave it a no double jump downside is questionable at best. Like the Colbat, this needs some playtesting to see if I accidentally made this weapon stronger. Other than that, I buffed the Soda Popper.
weapons.description: When Hype is full, Alt-fire to activate hype mode for multiple jumps and full air control.

weapons.name: Specialist
changes: Renamed from 'Specialist (V.1.)' to 'Specialist'
Updated stats to new configuration focusing on debuff synergy and accuracy
Removed previous support-oriented stats
Added debuff minicrit capability
Added faster deploy speed and accuracy bonuses
Added clip size reduction, pellet reduction, and knockback vulnerability penalties
weapons.reasoning: Updated the Specialist to focus on debuff synergy and precision rather than support capabilities, making it a more specialized combat weapon that rewards debuff application and quick deployment.

weapons.name: Concealed Carry

positive: Health gained on kill can overheal

changes: The overheal gain from a kill drains slower, similar to Conniver's Kunai
Removed the 'Overheal does not decay' stat
weapons.reasoning: The goal for this change is to make the Concealed Carry's overheal less powerful. A non-drainable and permanent overheal unless you take damage is a little too much.
weapons.description: [Hidden] Overheal drain rate is equal to Conniver's Kunai's overheal drain.

weapons.name: Mad Milk

positive: Players heal 45% of the damage done to an enemy covered with milk
Can be used to extinguish fires

changes: Increased damage healing from 35% to 50%
Increased effect duration from 6s to 10s
Increased cooldown from 20s to 30s
Increased extinguish cooldown from 10s to 15s
weapons.reasoning: Mad milk is now stronger! But it has a longer cooldown bwomp
weapons.description: [Hidden] Recharge time is 30s, 15s when extinguishing a teammate. [Hidden] Effect duration lasts 5s-10s.

weapons.name: Atomizer

positive: Grants Triple Jump while fully deployed

changes: Removed the '-10 health on triple jump' stat, even though they stated that they 'REMOVED' the stat in 2022.
weapons.reasoning: 'No -10 health on triple jump stat' It still happens when you use the weapon Fix your weapon Dorcus ðŸ˜

weapons.name: Wooden Sword

positive: Crits whenever it would normally mini- crit
On Hit: One target at a time is marked for death, causing all damage taken to be mini-crits
This weapon deploys and holsters 35% faster

changes: Reduced Mark for Death duration from 15 to 8
weapons.reasoning: That duration did not need to last that long

weapons.name: Grill Scout

positive: On Hit: target is ignited for 5 seconds
On Hit Teammate: Remove debuffs on teammate
+50 health gained from removing debuffs on teammates

changes: Listed the '+50 health gained from removing debuffs on teammates' stat in the weapon info
Decreased the slower firing speed from 60% to 50%
weapons.reasoning: Look who's a good little support Flanker? You are, YOU are!

weapons.name: Aerial Bomber

positive: Firing speed and projectile speed increases while blast jumping (50%)
Clip size increased on kill (up to +4)

changes: Decreased the explosion radius penalty from 30% to 10%
Added a 15% blast damage reduction when blast jumping
Increased clip size bonus on kill from +2 to +4
Added a -15% damage penalty
Decreased the faster firing and projectile speed from 60% to 50%

weapons.name: Friendly Fire Foiler
changes: [Still WIP]

weapons.name: Flare Gun

positive: This weapon will reload when not active

changes: Reduced afterburn duration so it's based on distance
Nerfed the maximum afterburn duration from 10 to 8 seconds
weapons.description: This weapon will reload when not active. [Hidden] Afterburn duration is 3-8 seconds depending on distance.

weapons.name: Detonator
changes: Buffed the maximum afterburn duration from 2 to 6 seconds
Listed the '+50% damage to self' stat in the weapon stats
Reduced afterburn duration so it's based on distance
weapons.description: Alt-Fire: Detonate flare. This weapon will reload when not active. [Hidden] Afterburn duration is 2-6 seconds depending on distance.

weapons.name: Hotwire

negative: -50% reduction in push force taken from damage

changes: Increased the push force reduction from 40% to 50%
Sappers now take 2 hits to get destroyed
Removed the 'Attacks pierce damage resistance effects and bonuses' stat
weapons.reasoning: Requires two hits to destroy a Sapper, no more one-tap. I know the pain and how it feels, Agent mains.

weapons.name: Iron Force

positive: Mini-crits targets launched airborne by explosions

changes: [Still WIP]

weapons.name: M249

positive: This weapon does not need to be revved up

changes: Decreased the damage bonus from 67% to 60%
Added a -X% more falloff
Added a -50% slower deploy speed
Added a -30% slower holster speed
weapons.reasoning: I DONT LIKE THIS WEAPON AT ALL

weapons.name: Maxine

positive: On kill: Gain a 3 second speed boost
negative: No ammo from dispensers when active

changes: Added a 'On kill: Gain a 3 second speed boost' stat
Removed '-25% clip size' stat
Removed '5 ammo consumed per second while deployed' stat
Removed '-50% strafing speed when spun up' stat
Removed 'Unable to crouch when spun up' stat
Reduced revved up move speed from 40% to 20%
Added a '-25% damage penalty' downside
weapons.description: Effect duration resets after every kill.

weapons.name: Sub Shotgun

positive: When weapon is active: On Kill: A burger is dropped

changes: Decreased the healing from healers penalty from 90% to 50%
Added a '-60% healing from health packs' stat

weapons.name: ROBAR

positive: On consumption: For the next 14 seconds, 50% of all damage dealt is returned as health

changes: Increased the damage dealt return as health from 33% to 50%
Increase the duration from 10s to 14s
Removed the '20 HPs per second' stat
weapons.description: On consumption: For the next 14 seconds, 50% of all damage dealt is returned as health. Alt: Share some Candy with a friend (Small Health Kit).

weapons.name: Gutbuster

positive: On kill against a sentry-targeted enemy: Gain a 'Gut'
negative: Mini-crits whenever it would normally crit

changes: Decreased the max health penalty from -25 to -15
Made every on kill effect happen if the enemy is targeted by your sentry
weapons.reasoning: SLIGHT rework Keyword - SLIGHT
weapons.description: Gives increased speed with every gut busted (up to 3).

weapons.name: Noisy Cricket

positive: On hit: 100% damage dealt is returned as metal

changes: Increased the metal-gain on hit from 70% to 100%
weapons.reasoning: It's not really that much of a difference, the fall off basically balances it out on the 100% damage dealt being converted/returned as metal.

weapons.name: Gunslinger

positive: Replaces the Sentry with a Mini-Sentry

changes: Increased the max health bonus from +10 to +25
weapons.reasoning: PLEASE BRING BACK OUR 150 HP KING DORCUS
weapons.description: Replaces the Sentry with a Mini-Sentry.

weapons.name: Mini Sentry
changes: Increased the firing speed from 20% to 50%
Increased the turret/turning speed from 20% to 50%
weapons.reasoning: I mean.. faster?

weapons.name: Dairy Douser

positive: Can be used to extinguish fires
On Hit: Apply Mad Milk for 6 seconds

changes: Showing the 'Can be used to extinguish fires' stat in the weapon info
Added 'Extinguishing teammates restores 50 health' stat
weapons.reasoning: REVERSE Syringe Crossbow. What if it heals you instead of healing others? You selfish bastard.
weapons.description: Can be used to extinguish fires.

weapons.name: Rejuvenator

positive: SuperCharge increases healing by 300% and grants immunity to movement-impairing effects
Mirror blast jumps and shield charges of patients

changes: Removed the uber penalty when activating SuperCharge and swapping patients
weapons.reasoning: This encourages Doctors to swap patients when Rejuvenator's SuperCharge is active. The Rejuvenator's uber is meant to heal teammates and help them sustain long enough in the fight.
weapons.description: SuperCharge increases healing by 300% and grants immunity to movement-impairing effects. Mirrors blast jumps and shield charges of patients. [Hidden] Uber penalty removed when SuperCharge is active.

weapons.name: Amputator

positive: +4 health regenerated per second on wearer

changes: +4 health regeneration is now passive instead of whenever the Amputator's active
weapons.reasoning: I don't get why it's when it's active instead of a wearer/passive health regeneration bonus.
weapons.description: Taunt: Applies a healing effect to all nearby teammates and yourself.

weapons.name: Huntsman

positive: The longer you aim, the more damage and faster the arrows travels
negative: Arrows start losing their accuracy if the bow is drawn for more than 4 seconds

changes: Doubled the time that the arrow loses its accuracy, from 2s to 4s
Added a 'This weapon will reload when not active' stat
weapons.reasoning: Decided to slightly buff the Huntsman to give it some quality of life changes.
weapons.description: Shoot arrows instead of bullets. [Hidden] This weapon will reload when not active.

weapons.name: Razorback

positive: 20% reduction in movement penalty while charging
negative: Shield breaks when absorbing overwhelming amount of damage

changes: Added a new function to the backpack, shield resistance that absorbs 30% of damage taken from enemy attacks
Increased move speed bonus from 7% to 10%
Removed its ability to block a single backstab
weapons.reasoning: HOW DO WE MAKE THIS WEAPON GOOD WITHOUT MAKING IT A 'FUCK YOU SPY' WEAPON ðŸ˜
weapons.description: [Hidden] Damage cap the shield can take until it breaks is 125.

weapons.name: Turtle Rock

positive: +50% reduced duration from all debuffs taken

changes: Added '+50% reduced time from all debuffs' stat
Removed '+25% fire resistance' stat
Removed 'Immune to the effects of afterburn' stat

weapons.name: Mischievous Machete

positive: Damage increases as the user becomes injured

changes: Removed the 'This weapon deploys 50% slower' stat
Replaced it with a '-20% slower firing speed' stat
weapons.reasoning: The goal of this change is to actually make this weapon Marksman's last resort. This melee's whole purpose is to deploy it when you have no other options, so why would you add a slower deploy speed?

weapons.name: The Slugger
changes: Slug shotgun concept
Single bullet per shot
Baseball-themed naming
weapons.reasoning: An idea conceptualized by a friend, making a new Flanker primary weapon a slug shotgun. The name of the weapon is also a reference to Baseball, since Slugger's a term for the sport. It fits Flanker's personality name-wise.
weapons.description: Fires one bullet per shot that does 70 base damage. This weapon reloads its entire clip at once.

weapons.name: Bloxaide

positive: Drink to regain up to +75 health
negative: -50% healing from healing sources on wearer

changes: Health drink concept
Substantial healing boost
Trade-off with other healing sources
weapons.reasoning: A health drink concept for Flanker that provides substantial healing but reduces healing from other sources. Could be useful for solo play or when medics are unavailable.

weapons.name: Mount-17
changes: Pistol concept for Trooper
Increased clip size
Accuracy improvements
weapons.reasoning: This has been one of the weapons that I'm really intrigued and interested in seeing. A Trooper pistol that's a sidegrade to your usual hitscan shotgun. It might be an underused/inoffensive concept and probably would have the same popularity as 50-AE where people do use it, it's just that some prefer MAC-10 more. Who knows.

weapons.name: Scorch Shot
changes: Conceptual flamethrower design
Alternative to current flare gun options
Focus on area control
weapons.reasoning: A conceptual alternative for Arsonist that could provide different playstyles compared to the current flare gun options.

weapons.name: Gas Passer
changes: Gas-based area denial weapon
Crowd control focus
Alternative Arsonist playstyle
weapons.reasoning: A gas-based weapon concept for Arsonist that could create area denial effects or provide alternative crowd control options.

weapons.name: Huo Long Heater
changes: Flamethrower concept for Brute
Area denial focus
Tanky playstyle synergy
weapons.reasoning: A flamethrower concept for Brute that could provide area denial capabilities and synergize with Brute's tanky playstyle.
